properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: StorageAccount
properties.help: The name or resource ID of the primary storage account to attach to the Azure Media Services account. Blob only accounts are not allowed as primary.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: Tags

properties.name: Add
properties.help: Add an object to a list of objects by specifying a path and key value pairs.  Example: --add property.listProperty <key=value, string or JSON string>.

properties.name: ForceString
properties.help: When using 'set' or 'add', preserve string literals instead of attempting to convert to JSON.

properties.name: Remove
properties.help: Remove a property or an element from a list.  Example: --remove property.list <indexToRemove> OR --remove propertyToRemove.

properties.name: Set
properties.help: Update an object by specifying a property path and value to set.  Example: --set property1.property2=<value>.

properties.name: BaseUri
properties.help: Base uri for http job input. It will be concatenated with provided file names. If no base uri is given, then the provided file list is assumed to be fully qualified uris.

properties.help: The app name or app URI to associate the RBAC with. If not present, a default name like '{amsaccountname}-access-sp' will be generated.

properties.name: Password
properties.help: The password used to log in. Also known as 'Client Secret'. If not present, a random secret will be generated.

properties.name: Role
properties.help: The role of the service principal.

properties.name: Xml
properties.help: Enables xml output format.

properties.name: Years
properties.help: Number of years for which the secret will be valid. Default: 1 year.
